title: DirectoryWatcher + auto-refresh with debounce
description:
Add low-overhead directory watching and automatic refresh.

Scope:
- Implement DirectoryWatcher using DispatchSourceFileSystemObject with O_EVTONLY.
- Watch .write, .rename, .delete events and debounce (around 200ms).
- Wire watcher to rescan and update the UI on @MainActor.
- Handle errors or missing permissions with a visible error state and a Change Folder action.
- Ensure clean teardown (cancel source, close fd).

title: Per-folder SF Symbol icon selection
description:
Allow users to select per-folder SF Symbol icons.

Scope:
- Add symbolName to FolderConfig and persist it.
- Provide a simple icon picker (text field, preview, curated list of symbols).
- Update the status item icon immediately and persist across restarts.

title: Menu bar popover shell (NSStatusItem + NSPopover)
description:
Build the basic menu bar app shell using AppKit + SwiftUI.

Scope:
- Use NSStatusItem with an SF Symbol template icon.
- Toggle an NSPopover from the status item button.
- Popover content is a SwiftUI view hosted via NSHostingController with a placeholder list.
- Set NSPopover.behavior to applicationDefined or semitransient to avoid auto-dismiss during drag.
- Ensure the app runs as an LSUIElement (no Dock icon) via the packaged Info.plist.
- Keep UI state on @MainActor and use os.Logger for basic lifecycle logging.

title: Restructure SwiftPM package for core library + app target
description: Update Package.swift to add FolderBarCore library target, FolderBar executable target, and FolderBarTests test target; move sources into  and  following SwiftPM conventions.

title: Manual QA checklist doc
description:
Document the manual QA checklist for core behaviors.

Scope:
- Add a QA checklist doc with the drag-and-drop matrix (Safari/Chrome GitHub PR, Slack, Finder).
- Include multi-folder persistence checks and folder permission failure handling.
- Keep the checklist easy to update as features ship.
notes: - Added QA_CHECKLIST.md covering panel behavior, drag-and-drop matrix, sorting, permissions/failure scenarios, and multi-folder checks.

title: Split app target into FolderBarApp + add IconPickerModel seams/tests
Icon picker shows empty after initial load
description: Icon picker briefly shows symbols, then flips to 'No symbols available'. Likely caused by debounced filter task scheduled before symbols finish loading, overwriting displayed list with empty snapshot.

title: Lint configs + local scripts
description:
Add SwiftFormat/SwiftLint configs and local lint scripts.

Scope:
- Add .swiftformat and .swiftlint.yml configs.
- Add local scripts or Makefile targets to run swiftformat/swiftlint.
- Document lint usage in README.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Lint config files exist in repo.
- Local lint commands run without CI.
- README documents how to run lint locally.
notes:
- Added .swiftformat and .swiftlint.yml configs.
- Added Makefile targets: make format / make lint.
- README documents installing swiftformat/swiftlint and running lint locally.
- Aligned swiftformat config with swiftlint (no trailing commas; no multiline statement brace wrapping).
- Ran swiftformat + swiftlint successfully.

title: Render folder contents in popover + initial folder selection
description:
Render real folder contents in the popover UI and handle initial folder choice.

Scope:
- Show a null-state view when no folder is selected, with a Choose Folder button (no auto prompt).
- Persist the selected folder to UserDefaults.
- Use FolderScanner to load items and show them in a list with file icons and names.
- Refresh the list when the popover opens (manual refresh).
- If the folder is missing/unavailable, reset to the null state.
- Hovering rows shows a drag-style cursor.
- Clicking items does nothing for now.

title: Add basic tests for FolderScanner
description: Add FolderScanner tests that create a temp directory with files and verify sort order + hidden-file filtering.

title: Change Folder dialog should be frontmost
description:
Ensure the Change Folder NSOpenPanel appears above the popover and is frontmost.

Scope:
- Present the NSOpenPanel as a sheet or ensure it is ordered front.
- Avoid the panel appearing behind the popover window.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Change Folder dialog always appears on top and is immediately interactive.

title: Local dev code signing
description:
Sign the packaged app for local development to reduce permission prompts.

Scope:
- Add optional signing to Scripts/package_app.sh (or a wrapper) using a configured identity.
- Support ad-hoc signing fallback if no identity is configured.
- Document how to set the signing identity (env var or config file).

Acceptance Criteria:
- Packaged app is signed for local runs when identity is provided.
- No extra permission prompts when launching the signed app locally.
- Build still succeeds without a signing identity.
notes:
- Added optional codesign step in Scripts/package_app.sh.
- Default behavior is ad-hoc signing when SIGNING_IDENTITY is unset; can skip with SIGN_ADHOC=0.
- README documents how to list identities and set SIGNING_IDENTITY.
- For stable TCC prompts, set SIGNING_IDENTITY to a persistent signing identity (Apple Development or Developer ID).

title: Fix app icon asset (use properly composed icon)
description: Current app icon looks like a raw/uncomposed image. Replace the source icon with a properly composed/cropped macOS app icon (as produced by an app icon builder), regenerate .icns as needed, and ensure Dock/Finder/App Switcher show the polished icon in debug and release builds.

title: WebP thumbnail support
description:
Ensure WebP files render thumbnails in the list.

Scope:
- Verify Quick Look generates thumbnails for .webp.
- If needed, add a fallback decoder or use a custom thumbnail provider.
- Cache thumbnails alongside other image formats.

Acceptance Criteria:
- .webp files show image thumbnails in the list.
notes: - Verified WebP thumbnails render via Quick Look; no extra work needed.

title: Fix popover positioning for SwiftUI content
description: Popover opens far below status bar; need stable SwiftUI popover anchoring without jump. Investigate NSStatusItem/NSPopover anchoring and match macOS menu bar positioning.

title: Document build/run workflow and architecture
description: Add README with CLI build/run steps (swift build + package_app.sh), project structure notes, and basic usage.

title: Core unit tests (scanner, config, date formatting)
description:
Add core unit tests for scanning, config, and date formatting.

Scope:
- FolderScanner tests using a temp directory to verify creation-date sorting.
- AppConfigStore load/save tests with atomic write behavior.
- DateFormatting helper tests for relative dates or consistent display formatting.
- Optional DirectoryWatcher integration tests guarded by an env flag to avoid CI flakiness.

title: Release automation: GitHub Release + sign_update + appcast.xml update
description: Extend Scripts/release.sh to tag v<VERSION>, publish GitHub Release assets (ZIP+DMG) via gh, sign the ZIP payload using Sparkle sign_update (Ed25519), and update/commit/push appcast.xml with a new <item>.
notes: - Added Scripts/update_appcast.py to insert newest Sparkle <item> into appcast.xml\n- Extended Scripts/release.sh to: validate clean/up-to-date main, tag v<VERSION>, publish GitHub release via gh, sign ZIP with sign_update (Ed25519), update+commit+push appcast.xml\n- Added safety flags: SKIP_PUBLISH=1 for build-only; FORCE_TAG=1 / FORCE_RELEASE=1 to overwrite existing tag/release assets

title: Fix icon picker search crash
description: Icon picker sheet crashes when typing in the search field (dispatch_assert_queue / MainActor executor mismatch). Refactor filtering so background work doesn't capture MainActor-isolated state.

title: Release pipeline (signing + notarization)
description:
Create a direct-download release pipeline (signed and notarized).

Scope:
- Add version.env and read version info in package_app.sh.
- Add Scripts/notarize.sh and Scripts/release.sh to codesign, zip, notarize, and staple.
- Produce FolderBar-x.y.z.zip for GitHub Releases.

Note:
- Local dev signing is tracked separately in FolderBar-4vc.
notes:
- Added version.env and release scripts; package_app.sh sources .env/.env.local and version.env.
- Added Scripts/notarize.sh (API key) and Scripts/release.sh (sign, notarize, staple, zip).
- Release uses RELEASE_SIGNING_IDENTITY, NOTARY_KEY_ID/ISSUER_ID/PATH from .env.
- Verified release.sh: notarization accepted and stapled; produced build/FolderBar-0.1.0.zip.

title: Panel chrome cleanup (padding, separators, scroll reset)
description:
Polish the popover chrome and list behavior.

Scope:
- Reduce excess top padding in the panel header area.
- Add separators above and below the scroll list.
- Ensure the list scrolls to the top whenever the panel opens.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Header spacing feels tight (no large empty gap).
- List has a clear top and bottom divider.
- Reopening the panel always shows the list at the top.
notes:
- Tightened top padding and reduced header spacing.
- Removed horizontal padding around list so separators span full width.
- Added top/bottom list dividers flush with scroll area.
- List now scrolls to top on panel open via scroll token.

title: Icon picker initial load shows no results
description: Icon picker sheet shows 'No results' on first open until the user types. Should show full symbol grid when filter is empty.

title: Core models + FolderScanner (creation-date sort)
description:
Implement core models and folder scanning in FolderBarCore.

Scope:
- Add FolderConfig, FolderChildItem, and FolderSnapshot models.
- Implement FolderScanner.scan(folderURL:) to read immediate children only (no recursion).
- Use resource keys: name, isDirectory, creationDate, contentModificationDate.
- Sort by creationDate desc, falling back to contentModificationDate, then distantPast.
- No ignore rules or hidden-file filtering; include everything in the immediate directory.

title: Prevent multiple Change Folder dialogs
description:
Only allow a single Change Folder dialog at a time.

Scope:
- Track whether an NSOpenPanel is already open.
- Ignore or disable Change Folder actions while the dialog is visible.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Repeated clicks do not open multiple dialogs.
- UI remains responsive after the dialog is closed.

title: Panel UI polish + media thumbnails
description:
Polish the panel UI for media sharing workflows.

Scope:
- Improve row layout (spacing, truncation, relative date).
- Optionally show file type hints (PNG, MP4, etc.).
- Generate thumbnails for images/videos asynchronously (Quick Look thumbnail generator preferred).
- Cache thumbnails in memory and keep UI responsive.
- Ensure drag uses the actual file URL, not a thumbnail proxy.
notes: - Future metadata work split into: FolderBar-8a9 (date + size formatting) and FolderBar-hk2 (video duration in metadata).

title: CI workflow (build/test/lint)
description:
Add CI quality gates.

Scope:
- Add .github/workflows/ci.yml to run swift build and swift test.
- Run swiftformat/swiftlint in CI (using repo configs).

Note:
- compile_and_run.sh already exists (FolderBar-0zr).
- Lint configs are tracked in FolderBar-4hl.
notes:
- Added GitHub Actions workflow (.github/workflows/ci.yml) for build/test/lint.
- Uses macos-15 runner with Swift 6.1.
- Installs swiftformat/swiftlint via brew; runs swift build, swift test, swiftformat --lint, swiftlint --strict.

title: Popover overflow menu (quit + change folder + change icon)
description:
Add an overflow menu at the bottom of the panel for common actions.

Scope:
- Add a "..." menu button in the panel footer.
- Menu items: Change Folder, Change Icon, Quit.
- Change Folder opens NSOpenPanel and updates the selected folder (persist to UserDefaults).
- Quit terminates the app.
- Change Icon is a placeholder until FolderBar-0ui (can be disabled or show "Coming soon").

Acceptance Criteria:
- Footer menu is visible and accessible.
- Change Folder updates the selection and refreshes the list.
- Quit exits the app.
- Change Icon is present but gated if needed.
notes:
- Added bottom-right overflow menu (ellipsis-circle) using standard Menu.
- Menu actions: Change Folder (opens picker), Change Icon placeholder (disabled), Quit.
- Footer menu appears in both empty state and list state.

title: Integrate Sparkle 2 + updater wrapper + silent probe scheduling
description: Add Sparkle via SwiftPM and introduce an app-owned updater wrapper that supports silent probes (no UI) and user-initiated updates. Schedule probe checks from app lifecycle with UserDefaults gating.
notes:
- Added Sparkle 2.8.1 via SwiftPM (Package.swift)
- Added Sources/FolderBar/Updater/FolderBarUpdater.swift (SPUStandardUpdaterController wrapper)
- AppDelegate starts updater + schedules silent probes (delayed launch probe + UserDefaults-gated intervals)
- Updater stays disabled unless running from a .app bundle and SUFeedURL is non-empty

title: Packaging: Embed Sparkle.framework + Info.plist keys + signing order
description: Update Scripts/package_app.sh to bundle Sparkle.framework into Contents/Frameworks, add required rpath, write Sparkle Info.plist keys (SUFeedURL, SUPublicEDKey, SUEnableAutomaticChecks=NO), and sign Sparkle nested components correctly for Developer ID builds.
notes: - package_app.sh now requires Sparkle.framework to be present (fail fast if missing)\n- Release builds default SUFeedURL to raw GitHub appcast URL and require SPARKLE_PUBLIC_ED_KEY to be set\n- Verified release-mode packaging signs and passes codesign --verify --deep --strict; Info.plist contains SUFeedURL/SUPublicEDKey/SUEnableAutomaticChecks

title: FolderBarCore scanner/model tests
Release DMG packaging
description: Create a distributable .dmg with app + Applications link for drag install.

title: Improve menu bar icon picker UI
Add local plans folder to .gitignore
Add package_app.sh + Makefile dev loop
description: Create Scripts/package_app.sh to build and assemble FolderBar.app with Info.plist (LSUIElement). Add Makefile target to build/package/open app.

title: Add snapshot tests for SettingsView + IconPickerView
Dynamic panel height based on item count
description:
Set the scroll area height based on item count to hint scrollability.

Scope:
- Compute item row height and set list area height to itemHeight * (n + 0.5).
- Clamp to reasonable min/max (e.g., 3.5 rows min, 10.5 rows max).
- Ensure panel resizes smoothly when item count changes.

Acceptance Criteria:
- List shows ~half row at bottom to indicate more content.
- Panel height adjusts with item count within min/max bounds.
- Scrolling still works and no layout jumps.
notes:
- Added PanelLayout constants to control panel sizing.
- Set visible row count to 5.5 via list height (rowHeight * 5.5) and matched panel height to header + list + footer.
- Scroll area now shows half row to hint scrollability.

title: AppConfigStore + multi-folder status items
description:
Persist folder configuration and support multiple status items.

Scope:
- Implement AppConfigStore to load/save AppConfig JSON in Application Support (atomic writes).
- Define AppConfig { folders: [FolderConfig] } and persist symbolName if present.
- Implement FolderManager + FolderInstance to create one status item per folder.
- Add actions: Add Folder, Remove This Folder, Change Folder.
- Ensure watcher and UI are reinitialized on config changes.

title: Implement DirectoryWatcher (DispatchSource-based)
description: Add DirectoryWatcher.swift to FolderBarCore using DispatchSourceFileSystemObject with debounce; invoke callback on changes; ensure clean teardown.

title: Metadata formatting: date/size
description:
Adjust row metadata formatting to show relative time for items created today and absolute date otherwise; include file size in human-readable units.

Scope:
- Use relative time only if creationDate is today, otherwise use a short date format.
- Append file size (KB/MB/GB) after the time/date.
- Ensure metadata text remains subtle and compact.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Today items show relative time; older items show date.
- File size is shown in KB/MB/GB where applicable.
notes:
- Added file size to metadata and date formatting: relative if created today, otherwise short date.
- Relative time shows “A moment ago” for <1m and refreshes on panel open + while panel is visible (timer starts on open, stops on close).
- Added fileSize to FolderChildItem and FolderScanner.

title: Show Dock icon while Settings window is open
description: When Settings window is shown, app should temporarily use activationPolicy(.regular) so a Dock icon appears (similar to folder picker behavior). Restore .accessory when Settings closes.

title: Folder picker should foreground when opened
description:
Repro:
1) Click Choose Folder to open NSOpenPanel
2) Activate another app/window so the picker goes behind
3) Click Choose Folder again (from panel or Settings)

Expected: existing picker comes to front
Actual: action no-ops due to single-dialog guard; Settings Change button disabled makes it hard to find

Fix:
- Track active NSOpenPanel instance
- On repeat invocation, activate app + order the existing panel front
- Keep Settings button enabled (label becomes Show…)

Acceptance:
- Repeat clicks bring the open panel to the front
- Settings remains usable to surface the picker

title: Drag-and-drop out of popover (Finder-like)
description:
Make drag-and-drop out of the popover behave like Finder.

Scope:
- Implement SwiftUI onDrag for each row using NSItemProvider with file URLs (UTType.fileURL).
- Add a secondary representation if needed (plain-text path) for app compatibility.
- Set NSPopover.behavior to applicationDefined or semitransient and manage dismissal explicitly.
- Verify drag works to browsers, Slack/Messages, and Finder without cancellation.

title: Improve icon picker performance and centering
description: Icon picker sheet: center glyphs in cells; improve scroll/filter performance (debounced background filtering, avoid per-render filtering, reduce cell overhead).

title: Auto-load local signing identity
description:
Make compile_and_run/package_app auto-load a local signing identity so signing works out of the box.

Scope:
- Support a local .env (or .env.local) for SIGNING_IDENTITY and SIGN_ADHOC.
- Ensure the env file is gitignored and documented.
- compile_and_run.sh should source the env file and pass through to package_app.sh.

Acceptance Criteria:
- User can set SIGNING_IDENTITY once in a local env file and compile_and_run uses it automatically.
- The env file is ignored by git and documented.
- Build works when env file is absent (fallback to ad-hoc signing).
notes:
- Added .env.local support to package_app.sh and compile_and_run.sh for local signing identity.
- .env.local and .env are gitignored.
- README documents .env.local usage for SIGNING_IDENTITY/SIGN_ADHOC.
- Added .env.local with James Kraus Apple Development identity (local only).

title: Implement FolderScanner + FolderChildItem model
description: Add FolderScanner.swift to FolderBarCore with FolderChildItem model; scan immediate children, skip hidden items, sort by creation date descending.

title: Add pre-push hook to run SwiftLint
description: Add a repository-managed pre-push hook that runs SwiftLint (or the project's lint command) to prevent pushing broken/lint-failing code. Prefer an install script (e.g. Scripts/install_git_hooks.sh) that configures .git/hooks/pre-push to call a repo script, since .git/hooks isn't tracked. Keep it fast and skippable when needed.

title: Add compile_and_run.sh dev loop
description: Add Scripts/compile_and_run.sh that builds, packages, kills any running FolderBar instance, and opens the .app bundle. Include README/Makefile note for dev loop usage.

title: Settings panel for folder + about + reset
description: Add a Settings window to edit the selected folder, show app version, and reset all settings.

title: Video duration in row metadata
description:
Show video duration in row metadata for video files.

Scope:
- Detect video files (UTType.movie or common video extensions).
- Extract duration asynchronously (AVAsset) and cache.
- Display duration as mm:ss (e.g., 00m12s).
- Format metadata like "6 mins ago  523KB  00m12s" for videos.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Video rows show duration; non-video rows do not.
- Duration loads asynchronously without blocking UI.
- Metadata string formatting matches the spacing and ordering guidance.

title: Null state UI for no folder selected
description:
Provide a clear null state when no folder is selected.

Scope:
- When no selected folder is stored, popover shows a null state message and a 'Choose Folder' button.
- Button opens NSOpenPanel to pick a folder.
- Once chosen, persist to UserDefaults and refresh the list.

Acceptance Criteria:
- If user cancels initial folder picker, popover shows null state with button.
- Selecting a folder from the null state updates the UI and persists selection.

title: Make install_git_hooks append to existing pre-push hook
description: Update Scripts/install_git_hooks.sh to append SwiftLint hook invocation to any existing .git/hooks/pre-push (e.g. bd), rather than replacing it.

title: Add appcast.xml template + Sparkle key management docs
description: Add repo-root appcast.xml template hosted from main and document generating/storing Sparkle Ed25519 keys (public key in Info.plist; private key never committed, stored via .env.local path or CI secret).
notes: - Added repo-root appcast template at appcast.xml (hosted via raw.githubusercontent.com on main)\n- Documented Sparkle Ed25519 key generation + env vars in README.md (SPARKLE_PUBLIC_ED_KEY, SPARKLE_FEED_URL, SPARKLE_ED_PRIVATE_KEY_FILE)\n- No private keys committed; intended to store private key path in .env.local or CI secrets

title: Docs: Add Sparkle update scenarios to QA checklist
description: Extend the manual QA checklist to include Sparkle update end-to-end scenarios (old version detects update, routes to Settings, Update installs new version).
notes: - Extended manual QA checklist (QA_CHECKLIST.md) with Sparkle update scenarios (indicator → Settings → Update… → relaunch) and negative cases.

title: Implement AppKit menubar UI for single folder
description: Add AppDelegate and main entry for FolderBar app target: create NSStatusItem + NSMenu, refresh from FolderScanner, open files, watch folder with DirectoryWatcher.

title: UI: Update available indicator + Settings Updates section
description: Thread FolderBarUpdater through panel + settings. Show 'Update available' in panel footer that opens Settings. Add Settings > Updates section with status text and an Update button that triggers Sparkle's standard UI.
notes:
- Threaded FolderBarUpdater into FolderPanelView + footer
- Panel footer shows 'Update available' button when updater reports a valid update; clicking opens Settings
- SettingsView adds Updates section with status/last checked/last error and an 'Update…' button that calls updater.userInitiatedUpdate()
- SettingsWindowController now accepts the shared updater instance

title: Move icon picker to separate view
description: Settings window icon picker should not clutter Settings. Move to a sheet/popover/window with a scrollable grid. Load all SF Symbols from system (CoreGlyphs symbol_order.plist) instead of curated list. Keep Settings padding comfortable.

title: Sparkle auto-update (MVP)
description: Add Sparkle-based self-update system (silent checks + in-app indicator + GitHub Releases/appcast). See plans/SPARKLE_AUTO_UPDATE_PLAN.md for working notes.
notes:
MVP Sparkle auto-update delivered:
- Sparkle 2 integrated with silent probes + user-initiated update
- Panel shows 'Update available' and routes to Settings
- Settings includes Updates section + Update… button
- appcast.xml template + key docs added
- Packaging embeds/sings Sparkle.framework; release.sh publishes GitHub release and updates appcast
- QA checklist includes update scenarios

title: package_app.sh does not rebuild before packaging
description: package_app.sh only calls 'swift build --show-bin-path', which can return stale binaries. compile_and_run.sh can launch outdated app. Investigate and ensure build occurs before packaging.

title: Sparkle update fails due to App Management permission
description: On macOS Ventura+, Sparkle update can abort with a Privacy & Security 'prevented from modifying apps' (TCC SystemPolicyAppBundles/App Management) denial, causing a generic 'Update Error'. Detect SUInstallationWriteNoPermissionError and show clear instructions (open Privacy & Security → App Management). Also harden packaging to prevent ad-hoc 'release' builds.
notes: - Added Sparkle error handling (didAbortWithError + formatted NSError) and detection for SUInstallationWriteNoPermissionError (App Management write denied)\n- Settings UI now shows actionable App Management guidance + button to open Privacy & Security when detected\n- Hardened Scripts/package_app.sh: release builds require SIGNING_IDENTITY and SIGN_ADHOC=0 to avoid ad-hoc Team ID mismatch issues
